html:
6.18.17  5:57 pm   do you do all the graphics in your vids

     yes

      or does a pal help you sometimes

     no

6.18.17  4:33 pm   You expressed that you prefer adding chords into your music after you write a melody with lyrics,

     that's not true

     and that the chords are hidden in the melody. Do you ever compose the other way around, building a melody off of some chords that you enjoy?

     i usually do it both at the same time

6.18.17  4:07 pm   What if myself is someone who pretends to be some one else, how do I be myself?

     so far you're doing great

6.18.17  12:06 pm   how do you know if youre an artist or not? do you just decide you are? do others have to tell you are? ... no you just decide.

     anyone can decide who they think is an artist. but i think it's more fun not to decide

6.18.17  10:51 am   What is it called when you mix a thing with a thing with another thing to make even greater thing?

     synergy?

6.18.17  9:39 am   if you just look at the title of your unrecorded songs, do you still remember how any of it goes?

     some of them but not all of them

6.18.17  9:22 am   How do you take note of the feel/groove you want when writing a song?

     first, a tempo marking. then maybe sort of sing the groove. maybe mention another song for reference. maybe say certain drum specifics, like "snare on 4." singing the basic kick snare pattern. maybe say whether it has swung 16ths, and how much. maybe a suggestion at what kind of instruments/sounds to do. but most important is just the tempo marking

6.18.17  9:02 am   What is your favorite interpretation of quantum mechanics?

     it's different depending on who asks

6.18.17  6:51 am   will you ever to a breakdown on your thought-process in making your music and/or videos, or do you consider that as an autopsy of your creativity, rather than a live dissection?

     i have surely done that many times before, and i will continue to do it, in the future

6.18.17  6:38 am   Jeremy Corbyn has wayyyy more followers than you on Instagram!!

     ah, thanks for the update

6.18.17  2:44 am   When compared to general classical music, pop music has strayed vastly from the complexity of older music.

     i disagree

      Do you think there is a way that pop music will ever return to a genre with such complexity in regards to key changes?

     key changes can be a useful and powerful tool. there are other tools as well

      I know jazz tries but do you think it's possible that a completely different genre of music could come about and achieve this task?

     jazz can mean many different things but it originally meant pop. harmonic complexity may or may not exist there, or anywhere

      Furthermore, do you think it's actually possible, with your knowledge in music theory, that such a blending of genres is yet to be found which could make the complex palatable in a way that the general population would accept it?

     key changes and harmonic complexity can be a very powerful tool. it is one of many tools. if you notice that a certain powerful tool is not being used to its full potential, you can start using it and you might have a huge advantage. i'm not sure if that answers your question

      If so, can you predict which direction/genre/ noun of music it will come from?

     anyone can make music, and so can you. i'm not sure if that answers your question

6.18.17  1:21 am   You mentioned wanting to tour-I'm guessing thats still quite a ways off from coming to fruition due to stuff like wanting to focus on the randomized songs, building up a song catalogue, time and money, etc?

     ah, yes

6.18.17  1:14 am   how to find a soulmate

     just be yourself. if that doesn't work, keep doing it
6.18.17  12:11 am   how long do you normally spend thinking of answers to these questions

6.17.17  11:14 pm   where is the universe i think im lost

     it's right here
6.17.17  10:39 pm   Why did you create your YouTube channel?

6.17.17  10:25 pm   bill, do you think that life has meaning?

     oh hell yeah

6.17.17  10:19 pm   who is diario??

     another mario character i suppose

6.17.17  10:18 pm   i think it's time for you to update the reality section, don't you?

     yes, but that would mean i would have to do less of the other things i am working on. oh i almost forgot, i am already working on a reality update, and it has caused me to do less of the other things i am working on. i hope that makes sense

6.17.17  10:16 pm   why did u end "all you need is love" with a major chord?

     why would i not

6.17.17  10:09 pm   I am a robot programmed to make music. I've been told that my music lacks what you humans call "feeling" or "soul"... If I use more variation in dynamics, incorporate grace notes, and throw in an occasional rubato passage... would that be enough to trick humans into believing that I play with this so-called "feeling"?

     you might convince them that you are feeling something, but it won't really make them feel anything

6.17.17  9:55 pm   if you can't finish your song until this tuesday, will you upload it another day of the week or you'll wait until next tuesday?

     i'll just try to post it as soon as i can and forget the whole thing ever happened

6.17.17  9:55 pm   I got bit by a goblin, and now I'm starting to feel woozy.. what should I do?

     you will have to bite someone else

6.17.17  9:29 pm   have you thought maybe you can release an older song on tuesday if the new one isn't finished in time? i know that's not as thrilling but it might be a good compromise?

     maybe but i'd rather finish the new one

WHERE DID YOU GO? WHERE DID YOU GO? WHERE DID YOU GO? WHERE DID YOU GO?

     when

6.17.17  8:26 pm   You make music... so that's like notes and stuff right?

     it can be

6.17.17  8:07 pm   What is the best day of the yaer?

     'today'

6.17.17  7:00 pm   You said that you just updated notes but when I go to notebook the latest notes are from last year??? (I'm pretty sure I can see some updated ones in expert mode but not in notebook)

     the ones i added were much older

6.17.17  6:48 pm   Do you think age is a number or a word?

     the word age is a word for a number. i hope that makes sense

6.17.17  6:25 pm   What are you working on right now? Can you tell us about it please

     it is a song

6.17.17  5:47 pm   when will the song be released?

     supposed to be tuesday but that's looking very difficult

6.17.17  5:30 pm   what is your opinion on the tesla cars and their electric energy!

     i think they are pretty cool. try insane mode, that was the way it originally was before they decided to tone it down because the acceleration was too insane

6.17.17  2:04 pm   are you like a magic 8 ball?

     no

6.17.17  1:02 pm   are you a banana?

     i will check

6.17.17  11:06 am   Is there a new song coming up

     oh hell yeah i will be doing songs til the cows come home

6.17.17  9:18 am   what did you do on june 12 2014

     probably work on the napkins video

6.17.17  9:03 am   What will you do if the new song isn't ready to release by Tuesday?

     keep working on it

6.17.17  8:45 am   What's the difference between an apple and banana?

     the shape, and more

6.17.17  7:47 am   how do you come up with anagrams so well?

     using my mellow shadow parachute (wooo)

6.17.17  5:09 am   Hey bill. Doing you think you will continue to put music in ITunes. (p.s. New Cannan is my favorite song ever) Bye

     all the new songs will go on itunes, etc. and i will probably sneak some older ones in too

6.17.17  2:55 am   In your opinion, what is usually the hardest part about writing a song?

     writing something to come before a part that's already written. that's not always necessary but sometimes it is

6.17.17  1:17 am   what's the difference between 12 am and pm

     usually about 12 hours

6.17.17  1:02 am   how many blueberries are too many?

     it depends how many you are supposed to have

6.16.17  11:44 pm   oh no. saw how you do lyrics melody and chords at the same time and i've been writing songs this whole time with just lyrics and a melody and trying to fit chords in after the fact and its always been so hard for me to do that. but if i find success in doing that what should I do with maybe 30-40 songs fragments or completed that only have lyrics and a melody in them and no chords

     the lyric and melody is really the important part. and the chords are already there, you just have to find them. it's kind of like you drew a doctor but you forgot the clothes. it's easy to figure out what kind of clothes they should be wearing, it should be doctor's clothes (probably)

6.16.17  11:32 pm   I donated some money, and I need to know if there's a good chance of a favorable return on my investment.

     was it a donation or an investment

6.16.17  11:05 pm   has hotewig mostly ended the country requests?

     you would think it did, but it did not

6.16.17  10:27 pm   Why is notebook on the front page of your website even though you haven't updated it in ages?

     i just updated it on monday, but i respect your opinion

6.16.17  10:03 pm   Do you want to build a snowman?

     right now i don't think i have time

6.16.17  9:41 pm   Were you sad when vine died?

     no

6.16.17  9:17 pm   BILL ARE YOU DEAD WHY DID YOU STOP ANSWERING QUESTIONS

     because i'm trying to finish the song on time which still may be impossible but i hope it is
